citation.abstract: MILES FRANKLIN REVIEW: The winner of the 2012 Miles Franklin Award will be announced this week. In preparation, The Conversation brings you academic reviews of the five novels shortlisted for Australia’s…

news.title: Should we put juveniles away for life? Meet the teen who sparked a debate
